title: Amazon SDE Internship
skills: AWS Services (Lambda, API Gateway, S3, CloudFormation, CloudFront, CloudWatch)
shortDescription: Designed and developed a web dashboard for the Amazon Smart Air Quality Monitor.
projectDescription: The Air Quality Monitor is a new device created by the Amazon Branded Connected Devices team, and at the start of my internship it did not have a web dashboard. My job was to design and implement this dashboard to display the customer's air quality data. Additionally, I architected and developed a backend service to serve mock data to the frontend, since the frontend was unable to ping the Alexa service due to an unsatisfied CORS requirement. Finally, I added authorization to the website using Login With Amazon.
thingsLearned: During this internship, I learned how to use React and Redux to create a single page website that displays customer data. Additionally, I learned how to setup and use AWS Services (Lambda, API Gateway, CloudFormation, CloudWatch) to serve mock data to the website. Furthermore, I learned how to use AWS S3 and CloudFront to host the website on AWS.
